Package jakarta.nosql.mapping.column

Interface ColumnTemplate

  • public interface ColumnTemplate
    This interface that represents the common operation between an entity and ColumnEntity
    See Also:
    ColumnFamilyManager

        <T> Iterable<T> insert​(Iterable<T> entities)
        Inserts entity, by default it's just run for each saving using insert(Object)}, each NoSQL vendor might replace to a more appropriate one.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        NullPointerException - when entities is null

      • insert

        <T> Iterable<T> insert​(Iterable<T> entities,
                       Duration ttl)
        Inserts entities collection entity with time to live, by default it's just run for each saving using insert(Object, Duration), each NoSQL vendor might replace to a more appropriate one.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the instance type
        Parameters:
        entities - entities to be saved
        ttl - time to live
        Returns:
        the entity saved
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when entities is null

      • singleResult

        <T> Optional<T> singleResult​(String query)
        Executes a query then bring the result as a unique result
        Type Parameters:
        T - the entity type
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        Returns:
        the result as Optional
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when the query is null
        NonUniqueResultException - if returns more than one result

        Returns:

      • find

        <T,​K> Optional<T> find​(Class<T> entityClass,
                             K id)
        Finds by Id.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the entity class type
        K - the id type
        Parameters:
        entityClass - the entity class
        id - the id value
        Returns:
        the entity instance otherwise Optional.empty()
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when either the entityClass or id are null
        IdNotFoundException - when the entityClass does not have the Id annotation

      • delete

        <T,​K> void delete​(Class<T> entityClass,
                        K id)
        Deletes by Id.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the entity class type
        K - the id type
        Parameters:
        entityClass - the entity class
        id - the id value
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when either the entityClass or id are null
        IdNotFoundException - when the entityClass does not have the Id annotation

      • count

        long count​(String columnFamily)
        Returns the number of elements from column family
        Parameters:
        columnFamily - the column family
        Returns:
        the number of elements
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when column family is null
        UnsupportedOperationException - when the database dot not have support

      • count

        <T> long count​(Class<T> entityClass)
        Returns the number of elements from column family
        Type Parameters:
        T - the entity type
        Parameters:
        entityClass - the column family
        Returns:
        the number of elements
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when column family is null
        UnsupportedOperationException - when the database dot not have support

      • singleResult

        <T> Optional<T> singleResult​(ColumnQuery query)
        Returns a single entity from query
        Type Parameters:
        T - the instance type
        Parameters:
        query - - query to figure out entities
        Returns:
        an entity on Optional or Optional.empty() when the result is not found.
        Throws:
        NonUniqueResultException - when the result has more than 1 entity
        NullPointerException - when query is null
